name: God is Myth / Man is Meat
name_original: God is Myth / Man is Meat
description:
you’re geist, mortal vessel imbued with the essence of the immortals.
you have a mission. it is the ring’s will. it must happen. it will happen.
you do not fear harm, death, killing or the unknown. not even the void.
you fear the ring. you fear the gods that carved you for them to instill.

The idea was to make a solo-arena/wave-based FPS with a Gougi-like (Fighting EX Layer) or Gem-like (Street Fighter X Tekken) system: you unlock powers during the action by fulfilling objectives.
